issue.title: [Python] Add documentation for Array.to_numpy
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2869](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2869). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See patch for ARROW-564

As part of this we should probably make a "Using pyarrow with NumPy" section in the docs (there is one for pandas already)
